definition: test point/to carry out trial/pilot scheme
to debug/to adjust components during testing/debugging
to try sth out/to be on probation

sentences.english: Now I am making an attempt to explain the positions of categories such as primitive accumulation and some others.
sentences.chinese: 這裏，對原始積累等範疇的位置，試提出一種解釋。

sentences.english: This paper described a novel thermopile detector for infrared horizon sensors.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道了試用於紅外地平儀的新型熱堆傳感器。

sentences.english: The fire proves gold, adversity brave men.
I'll give you some advice, Mike, don't try.
sentences.chinese: 邁克，我要給你些忠告，別去試。

sentences.english: B. Pick out the proper nouns in the following sentences.
sentences.chinese: 試選出以下句子中的專有名詞。

sentences.english: He took a deep draw on his pipe and tried again.
sentences.chinese: 他猛吸了一口煙，又試了起來。

sentences.english: Let me take your measurements first. You can come and try it on in three days.
sentences.chinese: 我先給你量一下尺寸，三天以後來試樣子。

sentences.english: And, of course, try to eat biodynamic food.
sentences.chinese: 當然還應該試着喫生物動力食品。

sentences.english: When failures happen, have software quickly identify those failures and retry requests.
sentences.chinese: 發生故障時，讓軟件快速識別失敗並重試請求。

sentences.english: Try running three days a week and cross-training two days a week for variety.
sentences.chinese: 試看看一個禮拜3天跑步，2天交叉訓練搭配做變化。

sentences.english: She fusses too much about her health; she's always trying some new medicines.
sentences.chinese: 她對身體太過擔心，她總是試着喫新藥。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man .
sentences.chinese: 烈火試真金，逆境煉壯士。

sentences.english: That done, he put the knife back in the drawer and shut it.
sentences.chinese: 試過以後，又把那刀子放進抽屜，重行推上。

sentences.english: East wind on the high grass sleep, try to ask his life fine days.
sentences.chinese: 東風吹草日高眠，試把平生細問天。

sentences.english: So don't try just one method to learn morse code.
sentences.chinese: 因此不只是試一個方法學習摩爾斯電碼。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to exchange/to change (clothes etc)/to substitute/to switch/to convert (currency)
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
